muchart 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Generate random samples from the gamma distribution

    r_g.Rd

    This function generates random samples from the gamma distribution.

    r_g(lots, n, mu, k, ...)

    Arguments

    lots

    The number of lots

    n

    The sample size

    mu

    The mean of the gamma distribution

    k

    The shape parameter of the gamma distribution

    ...

    Additional arguments to be passed to rgamma() from the stats package

    Value

    A matrix of random samples

    Examples

    r_g(lots = 5, n = 10, mu = 5, k = 2)
#>                n_1      n_2       n_3       n_4      n_5      n_6      n_7
#> sample_1 5.4276855 3.978775 1.1217234 1.2534084 7.211019 5.755742 7.822305
#> sample_2 2.4426422 3.327228 5.9183589 0.5388319 2.324425 1.191230 9.617903
#> sample_3 7.2566979 7.370449 3.4057690 7.6747945 4.536338 4.715848 8.293564
#> sample_4 6.3934236 7.997438 2.2393738 6.6640583 3.979746 4.137318 3.039327
#> sample_5 0.8621214 3.689995 0.1949895 4.9704708 7.632862 4.859164 3.726863
#>                 n_8       n_9      n_10
#> sample_1 10.2606782  6.081944 10.435975
#> sample_2  1.2908199  7.527724  7.193358
#> sample_3  0.7597486  3.994412  5.320359
#> sample_4  5.5328755  1.486846  1.361394
#> sample_5  3.5826484 14.702021 10.609529
